thread.title: natalie
thread.title_full: The Official ECCO Shop recenserad av natalie

author: natalie
title: natalie
text:
I love Ecco footwear & was glad to see they were on sale , so that I could purchase snow boots for my twins.
The description of product was why I purchased the boots. They're feet will stay warm and dry and comfortably to play around in them .
They have not worn them yet but the girls love them .
The downside is that should be in black as well. Quick delivery as well
